tool_description: Calculates comprehensive employee benefits costs including health insurance, retirement contributions, paid time off, and other benefits for labor cost modeling.

employee_count.description: Number of employees to calculate benefits for

health_plan_type.description: Type of health insurance plan: basic, standard, premium

retirement_contribution_rate.description: Employer retirement contribution rate as percentage (0-15)

pto_days.description: Annual paid time off days per employee

average_salary.description: Average annual salary for cost calculations

additional_benefits.description: Additional benefits to include in calculations

family_coverage_percentage.description: Percentage of employees with family health coverage (0-100)

error_messages: Invalid employee count: Employee count must be a positive integer greater than 0.
Invalid health plan type: Health plan type must be one of: basic, standard, premium.
Invalid contribution rate: Retirement contribution rate must be between 0 and 15 percent.
Invalid PTO days: PTO days must be between 0 and 365.
Invalid salary amount: Average salary must be a positive number greater than minimum wage equivalent.
Invalid family coverage percentage: Family coverage percentage must be between 0 and 100.
usage: Provide employee_count, health_plan_type, retirement_contribution_rate, pto_days, and average_salary. Optionally add additional_benefits and family_coverage_percentage. Returns detailed benefits cost breakdown.

total_annual_benefits_cost.description: Total annual benefits cost for all employees

cost_per_employee.description: Average benefits cost per employee annually

pto_cost.description: Total annual paid time off costs

benefits_as_percentage_of_salary.description: Benefits costs as percentage of total salary costs
